allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Use real Polymarket position data for trader profiles

Switch from broken gamma-api.polymarket.com to working
data-api.polymarket.com/v1/positions endpoint. All 72 traders now
populated with real position-level P&L \(cashPnl\), win rates, and
drawdown from actual Polymarket trading activity.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix copy trading: proxy to local backend, backfill traders first

Two issues preventing traders from showing:
1. Vite proxy defaulted to Railway URL - local frontend never hit
   local backend where traders were backfilled. Now defaults to
   localhost:8000 for development.
2. Trader backfill ran AFTER all heavy collection \(markets, prices,
   ML scans\) - Railway users hit the page before backfill finished.
   Moved backfill to run FIRST in pipeline startup.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
